member.summary: Checks if the date is within a specified range.

member.exception: Thrown when the cash savings does not match the specified range.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.ValidateLetter(System.Char)
member.summary: Checks if the character is an English letter.
member.exception: Thrown when the character is not an English letter.
